pull.title: depends: remove `PYTHONPATH` from config.site
pull.body:
We no-longer need this, as we no-longer build python packages.

Guix Build (aarch64):
```bash

```

ACK 95aab1f02784e5d92572ccfcd4ce27107e4b2888, setting `PYTHONPATH` is indeed not needed since https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28432.

verification.payload:
tree 9070b1e32e6095b885aff4d06188bb809391cc30
parent 830583eb9d07e054c54a177907a98153ab3e29ae
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1699624726 +0000
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1699979318 +0000

depends: remove PYTHONPATH from config.site

We no-longer need this, as we no-longer build python packages.

Effectively reverts de619a37fd18a17225c8a10b828fc61958abe4cf.

events.message:
depends: remove PYTHONPATH from config.site

We no-longer need this, as we no-longer build python packages.

Effectively reverts de619a37fd18a17225c8a10b828fc61958abe4cf.

events.body: I think we can drop everything. Pushed that up.
